item.description:
Instruction will be given in understanding both the pendulum and tarot as tools to the

This is for teens ages 13-15. Parents are welcome to attend as well. The Ryder deck will be used to teach, but children can bring any deck. Pendulum (a stone or other object which can be held on a chain or string) can be brought also. Directions are available at www.placeoflight.net on the Contact us and Others page. Or call 508-892-8928.

For more information, see http://www.placeoflig...
item.name: Tools that Lead to the Beyond
